{{short description|Fan site}}
The '''Tolkien Trail''' is an interactive Lord of the Rings fan site that launched in [[2000]].  It offers games and various other activities including the [[Entmoot]] forum, which was founded in [[1999]].  Users can move to places and select activities, guided for the most part by [[Gandalf the Grey|Gandalf]].


==External links==
* [http://www.tolkientrail.com Official website]
* [http://entmoot.tolkientrail.com Entmoot]
